readable.title: 2910758605_73a3f5a5c2
readable.content: A couple are walking along a street while the man carries a toddler over one shoulder . A couple is walking away while an infant sleeps on the father 's shoulders . A man carries a child while he walks with a woman . A man holding a sleeping child walks with a woman . The man walking next to the woman up the steps has a sleeping child on his shoulder .
